home.title: Invest According to Principles Without Being Swayed by Emotions
home.subTitle: Automated Trading using The Falcon
home.description.1: Even if you have your own principles when trading, it's easy to be swayed by emotions.
home.description.2: Falcon automatically executes trades based on user-set conditions to address this issue.
home.why.title: Why Should You Use Falcon?
home.why.1.problem: When trading cryptocurrencies, many hesitate when the price is too high, fearing it might drop, or too low, fearing it might drop even more.
home.why.1.solution: By using Falcon, you can automatically trade based on user-set conditions, thus addressing this issue.
home.why.2.problem: When you use Korean exchanges, to use accumulation investment or buying grid strategies, orders need to be manually placed each time.
home.why.2.solution: By integrating Falcon with exchanges, trades can be automated, solving this problem.
home.strategy.title: Supported Buying Strategies
home.strategy.dca.title: Dollar-Cost Averaging (DCA)
home.strategy.dca.description: DCA involves investing a fixed amount at regular intervals. When the cryptocurrency being invested in steadily rises, it can lower the average purchase price and increase profits.
home.strategy.buying_grid.title: Buying Grid
home.strategy.buying_grid.description: Buying grid involves buying at regular intervals when the price drops. This method can lower the average purchase price and increase profits when the price falls.
home.dca.title: What is Dollar-Cost Averaging (DCA)?
home.dca.description: Dollar-cost averaging (DCA) is an investment strategy that involves purchasing a fixed amount of an asset at regular intervals, regardless of the asset's price. This technique can help mitigate the impact of volatility on large purchases of financial assets such as stocks or cryptocurrencies.
home.exchanges.title: Available Cryptocurrency Exchanges
home.exchanges.upbit.title: Upbit
home.exchanges.upbit.description: You can use buying strategies such as accumulation investment and buying grid not supported on Upbit.
home.exchanges.binance_future.title: Binance (Futures)
home.exchanges.binance_future.descriptio: You can use automated trading services relatively inexpensively on Binance Futures exchange.
home.contact.title: If you have any questions, please contact me at

tasks.form.type.dca.description: A method of investing a fixed amount at regular intervals, which helps reduce volatility and lower the average purchase price to increase profits.
tasks.form.type.buying_grid.description: A method of buying at regular intervals when prices decline in the short term, aiming to lower the average purchase price during declines to increase profits.
tasks.form.grid.gap.description: Specify the percentage gap at which purchases will be made from the market price.
tasks.form.grid.quantity.description: Specify how many purchases will be made at the set intervals.
